events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to know how to get a refund.
Classified the reported problem as a Refund request based on customer's mention of refund and return.
Assigned refund specialist Sarah M. to handle the customer's refund inquiry promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm your order number and whether the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
Yes, the order number is 54321XYZ. The jacket is new, with tags still attached and in the original packaging.
Great! I’ve initiated your refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help with making the refund process easy.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, we will process the refund immediately.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I got the return label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thanks again for your support.
We have processed your refund as the jacket was received. The amount should reflect on your card within 3-5 business days.
Closing this case as your refund has been completed successfully. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
We’ve sent a short survey to gather your feedback on how well we handled your refund request.
